welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tanjungbalai, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Cap Go Can Tanjung Balai
restaurants.description: Cap Go Can Tanjung Balai is a seafood restaurant located in Asahan.
restaurants.address: Jalan Tanjung Balai, Teluk Nibung, Asahan, Asahan, Sumatera Utara
